channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Monthly checklist: Credit card perks and benefits you should be using in August
item.description: There are numerous monthly perks and credits you should be using on your credit cards in 2025. We've compiled them here so you won't forget about them...

item.title: Extra credit: How to pay college tuition with a credit card
item.description: When does it makes sense to incur a fee to use a credit card for tuition payments? Read here to find out.

item.title: Delta Air Lines slams AI pricing 'misinformation,' says it's not using customer data
item.description: Delta Air Lines fired back at lawmakers this week, disputing claims about its use of artificial intelligence in pricing fares.

item.title: New European border control system for non-EU travelers to launch this October
item.description: The EES will use biometric data to register the visits of non-European Union travelers.
